about_the_game:
A great and terrible fire has razed the Earth to ashes. As one of the few survivors of this catastrophe, you wander the desert alone, scouring the remains of civilization for supplies and hoping to come upon others with whom you can trade for necessities.

But as a horny gay man, food and water aren't the only things you find yourself craving...

SURVIVE


Manage your hunger and thirst, or die of starvation. Trade the knickknacks you find out in the world for the supplies you need to continue on.

CONNECT


Meet and form relationships with a diverse cast of over a dozen men. Some may seek a deeper connection, while others will just want to dick down and move on. Every encounter matters, no matter how fleeting.

DECIDE


It is up to you to forge your own path in this new world. Will you settle down with a community of survivors, or maintain your independence and survive solo?

EXPERIENCE


DESERT OF ASH: a Post-Apocalyptic Gay Sex Simulator is a carefully crafted story of sex and survival, with original art, fully illustrated sex scenes, and a soundtrack courtesy of Abstraction.
